Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES) or Manufacturing Operations Management systems (MOM) encompass a wide array of intelligent tools enabling you to integrate process data with other business systems including ERP systems giving you a complete view of how all of the moving parts of your operation interact with one another.


Typical MES systems include a handful of common components including:

  • Operational Equipment Effectiveness
  • (OEE) Tracking
  • Quality Monitoring
  • Recipe Management
  • energy Management
  • Statistical Process Control
  • Scheduling Integration
  • Work Order Management

Each of these tools give you better information about your process and business, providing the insight you need to cut costs, increase productivity, and increase revenue.

MES/MOM systems are implemented on top the systems and equipment you are currently using. They can scale as your information needs grow. No matter how many facilities you have, your MES/MOM system allows you to make intelligent decisions about all of them from one interface.

MES/MOM systems remove the limitations and hurdles currently standing in the way of reaching your maximum potential.


Our Philosophy

Our philosophy with MES and MOM systems is to develop easy-to-use systems to give you the information you need to run your company more efficiently. This starts with demonstrating how the system can cut costs, increase productivity, and increase revenue, while developing the business case for capital justification. We then help find the appropriate technology for your needs, based on existing infrastructure, number of facilities, support requirements, etc. We also spend time with corporate stakeholders and IT to find the best ways to integrate the systems with their workflows. After the system is designed and implemented, we provide training, documentation, and support for our customers to get the most value possible from their investment.


Our Service Offerings and Experience

We can develop new MES/MOM systems from the ground up, and can troubleshoot, update, and modify existing systems anywhere in the world. We are experienced with Siemens, Rockwell, Inductive Automation, Wonderware, and others, including the ability to develop custom systems to meet the needs of any size company.

Our MES/MOM systems have helped companies improve equipment utilization, improve operational efficiency and consistency, reduce inventory, reduce scrap and rework, improve response time to production issues, improve visibility to production data within single plant and across world wide manufacturing locations, and provide our customers with common data and reporting tools.

In addition to implemented MES/MOM systems we develop standardized reports, data visualization tools, APIs, and can implement process-level code to reduce the amount of time for MES/MOM system implementation.
